item.description:
EVENT: Come join us for a fun afternoon and some exercise as we go ice-skating at the Daly Memorial Rink on Nonantum rd. This Rink offers a lot of us the chance to get out of the house and enjoy a fun winter activity, http://www.newtoncoun... We will be skating for a couple of hours and then the plans are to go out for a cup of coffee or some soup, and maybe a snack afterwards.

TC: Heather P, Heather925@rcn.com
RSVP: Required by Mar 4th to Heather at the address above
MEET: Sunday March 7th at 2pm
COST: $5 admission, skate rentals are available and $5 for guests
item.how_to_find_us: Contact Heather, she is making the plans

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: ICE SKATING PARTY in NEWTON
